name: Laws of Karma — #3 Law of Humility
description:
It’s the third law out of 12 Laws of Karma that speaks about self acceptance & reflection. In order to change something in life, we must be humble enough to accept our flaws and mistakes before we can fix them and move on.

I hope no matter how ugly and uncomfortable our flaws are, we can deal with them so we can be the most beautiful version of ourselves.

This artwork is also part of OBJKT4OBJKT. I hope you get one (or two) (or more) for yourself ;)
